Description.Text: Set amidst a lush garden, the outdoor pool features a sun terrace with free sun loungers and umbrellas. A childrenâ€™s playground is provided for young guests. All air-conditioned units open to a furnished balcony with garden, pool or Ionian Sea views. Each accommodation is traditionally decorated fitted with wooden ceilings and mosquito nets over the beds. They include a kitchenette with a fridge and kettle, and a TV.

Hotel is located 100m from the beach and 8km from the city centre. Guests can find a bus stop, restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk. Fouxia Apartments and Studios is located 7 km from Corfu Town and Corfu International Airport. The picturesque village of Benitses is at 4 km. Free parking is provided on site.
